title: Compute Ingredient Amount
description: Compute the amount you need of a certain ingredient for a certain nutritional goal. For example, how much pineapple do you have to eat to get 10 grams of protein?

id.Name: id
id.Description: The id of the ingredient you want the amount for.

nutrient.Name: nutrient
nutrient.Description: The target nutrient. See a list of supported nutrients.

target.Name: target
target.Description: The target number of the given nutrient.

quota: Calling this endpoint requires 1 point. Learn more about quotas.
